cast.name: 马克·本杰明·普赫 Marc Benjamin Puch

writer.name: 迈克尔·费特·纳坦斯基 Michael Fetter Nathansky

director.name: 迈克尔·费特·纳坦斯基 Michael Fetter Nathansky

introduction: SAG DU ES MIR - YOU TELL ME is an interlaced anthology film about victims and offenders and the truth that lays between the lies.After 20 years Moni returns back home to her Sister Silke who has been attacked by a stranger. Moni is willing to do anything possible to find the attacker and to protect her sister. But is that what Silke really wants? And if so, who is actually the one, to be protected? And above all, protect from who? And which role does the offender René play, who doesn't even understand why he did it. - A melancholic film that plays with three differentperspectives and constantly reinvents itself while searching for answers.
